snippet: An apothecary’s cure for an injured bat also gives it the ability to speak.
abstract: Pseudonymous Bosch reviews middle-grade book Forest of Wonders: Wing & Claw No 1 by Linda Sue Park, illustrated by James Madsen.
lead_paragraph: An apothecary’s cure for an injured bat also gives it the ability to speak.
